title: The Original
desc: The park staff begin to notice strange behavior from the hosts; A mysterious Man in Black roams the park, wreaking havoc.

title: Chestnut
desc: Two guests arrive at the park with different expectations; Maeve's emotions are tweaked; The Man in Black seeks help from a condemned man.

title: The Stray
desc: Elsie and Stubbs search for a missing host; Teddy gets a new backstory; Bernard investigates the origins of madness and hallucinations within the hosts.

title: Dissonance Theory
desc: Dolores joins William and Logan on a bounty hunt; The Man in Black makes a significant discovery; Ford and Theresa discuss the park's future.

title: Contrapasso
desc: Dolores, William and Logan reach Pariah, and are recruited for a dangerous mission; The Man in Black meets an unlikely ally.

title: The Adversary
desc: Maeve charms Felix; Elsie discovers evidence that could point to sabotage; Teddy and the Man in Black conflict with a garrison.

title: Trompe L'Oeil
desc: Dolores, William and Lawrence journey into treacherous terrain; Maeve presents her demand; Bernard considers his next move.

title: Trace Decay
desc: Bernard struggles with a mandate; Teddy is troubled by dark memories; Maeve looks to change her script.

title: The Well-Tempered Clavier
desc: Dolores and Bernard reconnect with their pasts; Maeve makes a bold proposition to Hector; Teddy finds enlightenment, at a price.

title: The Bicameral Mind
desc: Ford unveils his bold new narrative; Dolores embraces her identity; Maeve sets her plan in motion.

title: Journey into Night
desc: The hosts revolt against the guests while searching for a new purpose; Maeve sets out to find her daughter with some unexpected help.

title: Reunion
desc: Dolores remembers she's been to the outside world; William makes a bold business venture.

title: Virtù e Fortuna
desc: Dolores makes her next move; Charlotte scrambles to protect Delos' most prized asset; Bernard gets closer to the truth.

title: The Riddle of the Sphinx
desc: An enigmatic figure becomes the center of Delos' secret project; The Man in Black and Lawrence follow the path to Las Mudas, but run into trouble.

title: Akane no Mai
desc: Maeve and her allies have revelations in a new world; Dolores makes a decision about Teddy; Karl discovers something sinister about the hosts.

title: Phase Space
desc: Maeve continues her search for her daughter; Dolores calculates her next move; Elsie gets closer to the truth about Delos.

title: Les Écorchés
desc: Bernard meets with an unexpected old friend; The Cradle is under threat; Maeve encounters a scene from her past.

title: Kiksuya
desc: The telling of Akecheta and the Ghost Nation's journey to consciousness; Maeve's life hangs in the balance.

title: Vanishing Point
desc: The Man in Black confronts his troubled past; Charlotte forms a plan to kill all the hosts.

title: The Passenger
desc: Everyone converges at the Valley Beyond.

title: Parce Domine
desc: Dolores sets out to find the architect of the Rehoboam; Bernard tries to blend in; Ex-soldier Caleb tries to find his way in neo-Los Angeles.

title: The Winter Line
desc: Maeve finds herself in a new park and meets a ghost from the past; Bernard makes his way back to Westworld.

title: The Absence of Field
desc: Charlotte grapples with reality; Dolores and Caleb begin to form a key partnership.

title: The Mother of Exiles
desc: Bernard and Ashley infiltrate a private charity event, while Dolores and Caleb make similar plans; The Man in Black prepares to re-enter society; Maeve comes face to face with an old comrade.

title: Genre
desc: Serac's past is revealed; Dolores pressures Liam for access to Rehoboam; Caleb is dosed with an unusual party drug.

title: Decoherence
desc: As the world falls into chaos, Serac gains control of Delos, changing Charlotte's plan; Maeve gets one last chance to stop Dolores; William starts his therapy.

title: Passed Pawn
desc: Caleb gets an insight on the true nature of his past; Dolores seeks out Rehoboam's predecessor, while Maeve tracks her down; Bernard, Stubbs, and William escape from all the chaos.

title: Crisis Theory
desc: Dolores' true intentions are revealed; Bernard confronts a ghost from his past; Maeve is conflicted; Serac's voice is dominant; Caleb's role is revealed; and William faces an unexpected villain.
